scenario_text.value:
I ain’t found nothing. What about you,
Takuma?

Ah well! As long as we keep looking together,
we’ll definitely find him soon!
Yeah... No point in giving up now!

Sure, I’ll keep looking around here for
a bit.
Huh? Is there...something in the water?

Oh? I thought I saw something, but...was it
just my mind playing tricks on me?
